Class Book

java.lang.Object
LibraryEntities.Book
@Entity public class Book extends Object
Represents a book entity in the library system.

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book()
      Default constructor for JPA.

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, String publisherName, int publicationYear, String isbn)
      Constructs a Book with basic fields.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the Book.
      author - The author of the Book.
      publisherName - The name of the publisher (string form).
      publicationYear - The year the Book was published.
      isbn - The unique ISBN number.
